issue_body: ### Project Name audit-trail ### Angular Version Angular 17 (Latest) ### Styling Framework CSS ### Additional Features - [x] Routing - [ ] State Management (NgRx) - [x] HTTP Client - [ ] Forms (Reactive & Template-driven) - [ ] Authentication Module - [ ] Unit Tests (Karma/Jasmine) - [ ] E2E Tests (Cypress) - [ ] Docker Support - [ ] PWA Support ### Project Structure Standalone Components (Recommended) ### Project Description create new api with below feature Audit Log Viewer Table: timestamp, user, action, resource, ip_address Filters: user, action type, resource type, date range Search: by resource ID or description Pagination: 50 items per page Detail view: shows before/after changes (JSON diff) Export: CSV/PDF buttons ### Confirmation - [x] I have reviewed the project requirements - [x] I understand this will create a new branch and PR
